btnAddColumn.label: Add Column
btnAddColumn.tooltip: Add a column to the right of the grid

chkShowLanguage.label: Show Language Options
chkShowLanguage.tooltip: If language options are available, show them.

chkShowAdvanced.label: Show Advanced Options
chkShowAdvanced.tooltip: If advanced options are available, show them.

chkShowToolbar.label: Show Toolbar
chkShowToolbar.tooltip: Show all the toolbars by default.

unmarkForCompletion.tooltip: This page is not required for completion

advancedPage.title: Advanced
advancedPage.tooltip: This page is not part of this (sub-)template and can only be added in advanced mode.

fileexists.title: Confirm

linkhandler.title: Enter the URL for the link

newproject.prompt: That folder is not empty. Are you sure you want to use it for the new project?
newproject.title: Confirm

openproject.prompt: Do you want to open the new project?
openproject.title: Confirm

initpreview.title: Info

confirm.prompt: Do you want to delete the item?
confirm.title: Confirmation

savefile.prompt: The XML could not be formatted, and changes have not been saved. Check your recent changes.

exitwizard.prompt: You are about to leave the editor.

changeLanguage.prompt: Do you want to change all the language options to the default values of language

Instructions.rectangle: Draw a rectangle by pressing the left mouse button and dragging.
Instructions.polygon: Click to add points to the polygon. Click the first (red) point to stop.
Instructions.reset: Press the ↺ reset button to start over.
Instructions.edit: The hotspot can be moved and changed by clicking on it.
Instructions.save: To save your selection, click the ☑ Ok button. If you want to go back without saving, click the ☒ cancel button.
Instructions.forceRectangle: Only rectangles can be drawn, flexible hotspots are not available.

Instructions.line1: Position a hotspot by clicking on the image.
Instructions.line2: Click and drag to rotate the image.
Instructions.reset: Press the ↺ reset button to start over.
Instructions.save: To save your selection, click the ☑ Ok button. If you want to go back without saving, click the ☒ cancel button.

Instructions.line1: Click the image to focus on a point or click and drag to rotate the image.
Instructions.reset: Press the ↺ reset button to start over.
Instructions.save: To save the view, click the ☑ Ok button. If you want to go back without saving, click the ☒ cancel button.
